Package micycle.peasygradients.utilities

Class ColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • micycle.peasygradients.utilities.ColorUtils
  • public final class ColorUtils
extends Object
    Contains static functions mostly related to color processing (mostly (de)composition).
    Author:
    micycle1

                                         double[] b,
                                         float step,
                                         double[] out)
        Linearly interpolate between 2 colors (color-space independent) using the given step.
        Parameters:
        a - double[3] (col 1)
        b - double[3] (col 2)
        step -
        out - double[]
        Returns:

      • interpolateLinear

        public static float[] interpolateLinear​(float[] col1,
                                        float[] col2,
                                        float step,
                                        float[] out)
        Returns a color by interpolating between two given colors. An alternative to Processing's native lerpcolor() method (which is linear).
        Parameters:
        col1 - First color, represented as [R,G,B,A] array; each value between 0...1.
        col2 - Second color, represented as [R,G,B,A] array; each value between 0...1.
        st - step: percentage between the two colors.
        out - The new interpolated color, represented by a [R,G,B,A] array.
        Returns:
